meta.description: Optimize the number of small and large crates to maximize the total number of grapes transported.

sets.name: CRATES
sets.description: Types of crates available for transporting grapes.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each type of crate in terms of number of grapes.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of crates of each type to use.

objective.name: max_total_grapes
objective.description: Maximize the total number of grapes transported.

constraints.name: small_crates_limit
constraints.description: At most 100 small crates can be used.

constraints.name: large_crates_limit
constraints.description: At most 50 large crates can be used.

constraints.name: total_crates_limit
constraints.description: The truck can take at most 60 crates in total.

constraints.name: min_large_crates
constraints.description: At least 10 large crates must be used.

constraints.name: small_to_large_ratio
constraints.description: At least 3 times as many small crates must be used than large crates.
